Test: Two-Variable Linear Regression - Eq2RAM

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan

2021-02-11

Source: vignettes/tests/test_two-variable-regression-Eq2RAM.Rmd
test_two-variable-regression-Eq2RAM.Rmd
A <- Apars <- S <- Spars <- matrixR::ZeroMatrix(3)
A[1, ] <- c(0, "beta", 1)
Apars[1, ] <- c(0, "p1", 1)
diag(S) <- c(0, "sigmax2", "sigmae2")
diag(Spars) <- c(0, "p3", "p2")
Filter <- diag(2)
Filter <- cbind(Filter, 0)
u <- as.matrix(c("alpha", "mux", 0))
upars <- as.matrix(c("p4", "p5", 0))

\[\begin{equation} \begin{split} y &= \alpha + \beta x + \varepsilon \end{split} \end{equation}\]

eq <- "
  # lhs op   rhs label
    e   by   y   1
    y   on   x   beta
    e   with e   sigmae2
    x   with x   sigmax2
    y   on   1   alpha
    x   on   1   mux
"
labels <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = FALSE)
testthat::test_that("A.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(A))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(A))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        A[i, j],
        labels$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŒˆ
testthat::test_that("S.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(S))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(S))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        S[i, j],
        labels$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
testthat::test_that("u.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(u))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(u))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        u[i, j],
        labels$u[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽ‰
testthat::test_that("Filter.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Filter))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Filter))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Filter[i, j],
        labels$Filter[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ˜¸
pars <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = TRUE)
testthat::test_that("Apars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Apars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Apars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Apars[i, j],
        pars$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
testthat::test_that("Spars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Spars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Spars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Spars[i, j],
        pars$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ˜€
testthat::test_that("upars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(upars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(upars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        upars[i, j],
        pars$u[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽŠ
testthat::test_that("Filter.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Filter))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Filter))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Filter[i, j],
        pars$Filter[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
alpha <- runif(n = 1, min = -1, max = 1)
beta <- runif(n = 1, min = -1, max = 1)
sigmax2 <- runif(n = 1, min = 0, max = 1)
sigmae2 <- runif(n = 1, min = 0, max = 1)
mux <- runif(n = 1, min = -1, max = 1)
A <- S <- matrixR::ZeroMatrix(3)
A[1, ] <- c(0, beta, 1)
Apars <- A
diag(S) <- c(0, sigmax2, sigmae2)
Spars <- S
Filter <- diag(2)
Filter <- cbind(Filter, 0)
u <- as.matrix(c(alpha, mux, 0))
upars <- u

\[\begin{equation} \begin{split} y &= -0.1668832 + 0.6011223 x + \varepsilon \end{split} \end{equation}\]

eq <- paste(
  "e by y 1", ";",
  "y on x", beta, ";",
  "e with e", sigmae2, ";",
  "x with x", sigmax2, ";",
  "y on 1", alpha, ";",
  "x on 1", mux, ";"
)
labels <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = FALSE)
testthat::test_that("A.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(A))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(A))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        A[i, j],
        labels$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
testthat::test_that("S.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(S))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(S))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        S[i, j],
        labels$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽŠ
testthat::test_that("u.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(u))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(u))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        u[i, j],
        labels$u[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽŠ
testthat::test_that("Filter.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Filter))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Filter))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Filter[i, j],
        labels$Filter[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
pars <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = TRUE)
testthat::test_that("Apars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Apars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Apars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Apars[i, j],
        pars$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŒˆ
testthat::test_that("Spars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Spars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Spars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Spars[i, j],
        pars$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ˜¸

      testthat::expect_equal(

        check.attributes = FALSE

    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
eq <- paste(
  "e by y 1", ";",
  "y on x", beta, ";",
  "e with e", sigmae2, ";",
  "x with x", sigmax2, ";"
)
labels <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = FALSE)
testthat::test_that("A.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(A))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(A))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        A[i, j],
        labels$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ˜¸
testthat::test_that("S.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(S))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(S))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        S[i, j],
        labels$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽŠ
testthat::test_that("Filter.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Filter))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Filter))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Filter[i, j],
        labels$Filter[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥‡
testthat::test_that("u.", {
  testthat::expect_true(
    is.null(labels$u),
  )
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽ‰
pars <- ramR::Eq2RAM(eq, par = TRUE)
testthat::test_that("Apars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Apars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Apars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Apars[i, j],
        pars$A[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŽ‰
testthat::test_that("Spars.", {
  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Spars))) {
    for (j in seq_len(ncol(Spars))) {
      testthat::expect_equal(
        Spars[i, j],
        pars$S[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸŒˆ

  for (i in seq_len(nrow(Filter))) {

        Filter[i, j],
        pars$Filter[i, j],
        check.attributes = FALSE
      )
    }
  }
})
#> Test passed ðŸ¥³

    is.null(pars$u),
  )
})
